About me

My Introduction

Hello! I'm Sakshi Saraswat, a passionate software engineer with a knack for building scalable web applications and a love for coding challenges. With a background in computer science and a drive to excel, I specialize in front-end and back-end development using technologies like JavaScript, Python, and HTML/CSS. Whether it's crafting intuitive user interfaces or optimizing database performance, I strive to create software that not only meets but exceeds user expectations. Take a look at my projects below to see how I turn ideas into reality.

Download CV
); }; export default About;
